title: EA Bonds Rocked by Buyback Offer Tying Them to Treasuries
description: Electronic Arts Inc.’s bonds plunged Tuesday after the prospective buyers of the videogame maker launched a buyback offer that tied the notes’ prices to US Treasuries.
content: Electronic Arts Inc.’s bonds plunged Tuesday after the prospective buyers of the videogame maker launched a buyback offer that tied the notes’ prices to US Treasuries.
